com.pi4j.component.adafruithat

Class AdafruitServoHat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitHat
      • com.pi4j.component.adafruithat.AdafruitServoHat

  • public class AdafruitServoHat
extends AdafruitHat
    This class extends the AdafruitHat superclass and handles the specific operating commanding for servos.
    Author:
    Eric Eliason
    See Also:
    AdafruitHat

    • Method Detail

      • getServo

        public AdafruitServo getServo(java.lang.String servo)
        Create an AdafruitServo instance for this servo. Each of the 16 servo pin sets is assigned a unique name "S01" through "S16". The pin sets are labeled on the Adafruit Servo HAT with numbers 0 through 15. "S01" corresponds to pin set 0, "S02" to pin set 1, etc.
        Parameters:
        servo - valid values "S01" through "S16"
        Returns:
        AdafruitServo instance for the specified servo
